news_header: Three companies will trade ex-dividend on 2/12/25, with United Rentals Inc, Tetra Tech Inc, and Willis Lease Finance Corp. declaring their upcoming dividends.
news_original_title: Ex-Dividend Reminder: United Rentals, Tetra Tech and Willis Lease Finance
news_text: On February 12, 2025, United Rentals Inc (URI), Tetra Tech Inc (TTEK), and Willis Lease Finance Corp. (WLFC) will trade ex-dividend. URI will pay a quarterly dividend of $1.79, TTEK will pay $0.058, and WLFC will pay $0.25. The dividends represent approximately 0.24%, 0.17%, and 0.13% of their respective stock prices. Historical dividend stability is important for assessing future yields, which are estimated at 0.97% for URI, 0.69% for TTEK, and 0.50% for WLFC. On the trading day, shares of these companies are down about 1.2%, 1.1%, and 0.9%, respectively.
